name: The Fall of Nemesis: Clash of the Kaijujin. Online.
blurb: An online 1-4 player fighting game featuring Giant Monsters (Kaiju).  Developed by the team who brought you the Godzilla series.

rewards.reward: BABY KAIJU - Every dollar counts!  Thank you for contributing!

YOUNG KAIJU - You are officially a member of the design team!  Everyone who contributes $5 or more will receive a login for the community design forums, where daily discussions will directly influence Kaiju Combat's feature set.
JUNIOR KAIJU - In addition to a design team login, you are eligible for a free copy of Kaiju Combat upon release.  Get your battle on!
ARTIST KAIJU -  In addition to a design team login & one free copy of Kaiju Combat upon release, you get an exclusive high-resolution wallpaper by Matt Frank!
KAIJULAND FAN - Get a copy of the KAIJULAND: ORIGINS comic, and a set of trading cards!  You still get the design login, free copy of Kaiju Combat, and the HD wallpaper too!
TEEN KAIJU - In addition to a design team login, get a limited-run Kaiju Combat T-shirt, with original artwork by Matt Frank!
TWIN KAIJU - Get a design team login, the wallpaper, and TWO copies of Kaiju Combat upon release!  Now your lazy friend has no excuse!
BIG KAIJU - Get your design team login, a free copy of the game upon release, the Kaiju Combat wallpaper AND the Kaiju Combat T-shirt.

BATTLE KAIJU - A free copy of all future Kaiju Combat releases!\r\n\r\nGet a design team login, plus a free copy of EVERY Kaiju Combat release!  Every new monster, environment, game mode, or anything else created as part of the Kaiju Combat project - you get them all for free!

CONTROLLER KAIJU - Have the control you need!  Get a copy of EVERY Kaiju Combat game released, plus a design team login, the HD wallpaper, PLUS a brand-new Logitech\u00ae  F710 Wireless Gamepad to crush the competition with!  Made possibly by the Kaiju-lovers at Logitech\u00ae - (limit of 25)
FANCY BATTLE KAIJU! - By popular request!  Get a design login, the wallpaper, the T-shirt, and a copy of every Kaiju Combat release ever!  Who says fighters can't be (art) lovers?

ALPHA KAIJU - Get access to the alpha!  Get a design team login, a free copy of every release, AND bi-monthly review copies of the game as we build it. This gives you a first-hand look at the state of Kaiju Combat every 2 months, to help inform your design opinions!

SENIOR KAIJU - Become a part of the game!  Have your likeness, voice, or some other self-representation added to the single-player story. (Limited of 25).  You also get everything from the $120 level!

OVERLORD KAIJU - Weekly Playable Builds! Download weekly review copies of the game.  You will have all the latest changes, updates and experiments every week.  If you want to have your finger on the pulse of development, this is the closest you can get without moving to Oregon!  You also get everything from the $120 level.

PROGENITOR KAIJU - Add your own monster!  Submit your original monster concept to our creative team, who will work closely with you to create a professional design document and concept piece for your monster.  Once finished, your monster is eligible to become fully playable fighting characters in a future Kaiju Combat game!  Plus you get everything from the $120 level!  (Limit of 50)

KAISER KAIJU - Win the shirt off our backs!  The team will sign and personalize one of Matt's limited-run T-shirts just for you!  We'll also send you a large print of a monster concept painting - suitable for framing.  You also get everything from the $120 level!

GRAND KING KAIJU - Come spend a day with the team at the Sunstone Games offices, play the latest builds, offer feedback & praise in person, and get free food & lodging!  You also get everything from the $120 level!  Mere mortals tremble at your visage!  (travel expenses not covered)  (limit of 10)
